title: Experiential Nursing Simulation: Citizen Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based education focused on improving general citizens' ability to handle real-life medical situations

learning_goals: Learners can perform emergency situation identification and initial response procedures with ≥80% accuracy in simulated environments
Learners enhance clinical judgment skills by 30% through a 4-stage experiential learning simulation process (experience-reflection-conceptualization-application)
Learners demonstrate real-world situational adaptability through ≥10 mobile-delivered virtual scenarios (e.g., cardiac arrest, diabetic shock)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
